segments.source_content:
---
title: Happy 1st Birthday Slash!
authors:
  - key: JMarcey
    title: Co-creator of Docusaurus
tags: [birth]
---

Docusaurus [went live](https://v1.docusaurus.io/blog/2017/12/14/introducing-docusaurus) on December 14, 2017. At the time, we had [8 early adopters](https://v1.docusaurus.io/blog/2017/12/14/introducing-docusaurus#acknowledgements).

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 於 2017 年 12 月 14 日[正式上線](https://v1.docusaurus.io/blog/2017/12/14/introducing-docusaurus)。當時我們僅有[8 個早期採用者](https://v1.docusaurus.io/blog/2017/12/14/introducing-docusaurus#acknowledgements)。

segments.source_content: We now have nearly [60 known users of Docusaurus](https://v1.docusaurus.io/en/users), and probably more that we don't know about. We have [9K GitHub stars](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus) and an active community, particularly [Yangshun Tay](https://x.com/yangshunz) and [Endilie Yacop Sucipto](https://x.com/endiliey), both of whom are the lead maintainers helping keep this project [moving forward](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2018/09/11/Towards-Docusaurus-2).

translations.zh-hant: 如今我們擁有近[60 個已知的 Docusaurus 用戶](https://v1.docusaurus.io/en/users)，可能還有更多未知的使用者。我們獲得了[9K GitHub 星標](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus)和活躍的社群，特別感謝[Yangshun Tay](https://x.com/yangshunz)和[Endilie Yacop Sucipto](https://x.com/endiliey)兩位主要維護者持續推動這個專案[向前發展](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2018/09/11/Towards-Docusaurus-2)。

segments.source_content: Thank you to everyone for your support and use of this project! I am super proud of how far this project has come in just a year.

translations.zh-hant: 感謝所有人的支持與使用！這個專案在短短一年內取得的進展讓我感到無比自豪。

segments.source_content: > Special thanks to [Eric Nakagawa](https://x.com/ericnakagawa), creator of Slash, for creating this 1-year image of Slash enjoying cake. The Slash brand has been a boon for us!

translations.zh-hant: > 特別感謝 [Eric Nakagawa](https://x.com/ericnakagawa)，Slash 的創作者，繪製了這張 Slash 享用蛋糕的一週年紀念圖。Slash 品牌形象為我們帶來了極大助益！
